movies.title: Sé infiel y no mires con quién
movies.plot: Pablo and Fernando, owners of a children's book publishing company about to go bankrupt, have managed through unorthodox means to contract the country's best-selling author, Adela Mora. The evening of the official signing, Paco asks his friend to let him use his house for a love tryst while Fernando wines and dines Adela. At the same time, Paco's wife, Carmen, will be taking her lover to Rosa's house. From here on the rout begins, as Paco tries to get rid of Silvia, his secretary, and Carmen, her husband. Fernando thinks Rosa is cheating on him with Oscar, who thinks Fernando is gay and having an affair with his partner, while the soldier thinks his girlfriend is a professional...
movies.simplePlot: Pablo and Fernando, owners of a children's book publishing company about to go bankrupt, have managed through unorthodox means to contract the country's best-selling author, Adela Mora. The...

biography.bio: Ana Belén was born on May 27, 1951 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as María del Pilar Cuesta Acosta. She has been married to Víctor Manuel since June 13, 1972. They have two children.
biography.name: Ana Belén

biography.bio: Descendant of the conservative Spanish politician Antonio Maura, Carmen lead an art gallery and appeared in various roles in night- clubs. With Tigres de papel (1977) she had her first successful appearance on the movie screen and thereafter she worked at the theatre, the movies and in TV productions. Although she played dramatic roles, too, her most important genre has always been the comedy, e.g. Coarse Salt (1984), Sé infiel y no mires con quién (1985) or Dear Nanny (1986). She has worked regularly with the Spanish director Pedro Almodóvar, from the film Pepi, Luci, Bom et les autres filles du quartier (1980) (taking in Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown (1988) for which she was awarded the European Film Award "Felix" as best actress) to, currently Volver (2006).
biography.name: Carmen Maura

biography.bio: Antonio Resines was born on August 7, 1954 in Torrelavega, Cantabria, Spain as Antonio Fernández Resines. He is an actor and producer, known for La famille Serrano (2003), Cellule 211 (2009) and A las once en casa (1998). He was previously married to Marisol de Mateo.
biography.name: Antonio Resines

biography.placeOfBirth: Boadilla, Salamanca, Castilla y León, Spain
biography.bio: Santiago Ramos was born on August 1, 1949 in Boadilla, Salamanca, Castilla y León, Spain as Santiago Ramos Sánchez. He is an actor, known for Aquí no hay quien viva (2003), El Lobo (2004) and Como un relámpago (1996). He has been married to Paca Almenara since August 2005.
biography.name: Santiago Ramos

biography.bio: Verónica Forqué was born on December 1, 1955 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as Verónica Forqué Vázquez-Vigo. She is an actress, known for Kika (1993), Pepa y Pepe (1995) and No Shame (2001). She was previously married to Manuel Iborra.
biography.name: Verónica Forqué

biography.placeOfBirth: Castellón de la Plana, Castellón, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain
biography.bio: Guillermo Montesinos was born on January 10, 1948 in Castellón de la Plana, Castellón, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain as Guillermo José Montesinos Serrano. He is an actor, known for Los ladrones van a la oficina (1993), Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown (1988) and The Heifer (1985).
biography.name: Guillermo Montesinos

biography.bio: Chus Lampreave was born on December 11, 1930 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as María Jesús Lampreave. She was an actress, known for Volver (2006), Talk to Her (2002) and Broken Embraces (2009). She was married to Eusebio Moreno de los Ríos. She died on April 4, 2016 in Almería, Almería, Andalucía, Spain.
biography.name: Chus Lampreave

biography.bio: José Luis Fernández 'Pirri' was born in 1965 in Madrid, Spain as José Luis Fernández Eguia. He was an actor, known for The Hit (1984), Sé infiel y no mires con quién (1985) and El pico 2 (1984). He died on May 9, 1988 in Madrid.
biography.name: José Luis Fernández 'Pirri'

biography.bio: Bibiana Fernández was born on February 13, 1954 in Tánger, Morocco as Manuel Fernández Chica. She is an actress, known for Sábado noche (1987), La gala de los 20 años (1995) and Fotogramas de Plata 93 (1994). She was previously married to Asdrúbal Ametller.
biography.name: Bibiana Fernández

biography.bio: Miguel Rellán was born on November 7, 1943 in Tetuan, Morocco as Miguel Ángel Rellán García. He is an actor, known for Revolución (2002), Menudo es mi padre (1996) and Compañeros (1998).
biography.name: Miguel Rellán

biography.bio: Carles Velat was born on November 3, 1946 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Carles Velat Abella. He was an actor, known for Locos por la tele (1990), The Heifer (1985) and Caín (1987). He was married to Marta Angelat. He died on August 24, 2016 in Barcelona.
biography.name: Carles Velat

biography.bio: El Gran Wyoming was born on May 14, 1955 in Madrid, Spain as José Miguel Monzón Navarro. He is an actor and director, known for Caiga quien caiga (1996), El intermedio (2006) and El club de la comedia (1999).
biography.name: El Gran Wyoming

biography.bio: Lucas Martín is an actor, known for Lovers: A True Story (1991), Year of Enlightment (1986) and Sé infiel y no mires con quién (1985).
biography.name: Lucas Martín

biography.bio: José María Cañete is an actor and director, known for Aquesta nit o mai (1992), Siesta (1987) and Le chevalier du dragon (1985).
biography.name: José María Cañete

biography.bio: Derek is an actor, known for Sé infiel y no mires con quién (1985).
biography.name: Derek
